Class DisplayController

java.lang.Object
DisplayController
public class DisplayController extends Object
Handles all console-based UI display and input logic for the digital calendar system. Works togather with the LogicController to interact with user accounts, calendar objects, and entries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DisplayController(LogicController logicController)
    Constructs a DisplayController with a reference to the logic controller.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayCalendar()
    Displays the monthly calendar grid for the currently selected calendar and date, including markers (*) on days with entries.

    Displays all entries that occur on a specific day of the currently selected calendar.

    Displays and handles options to view, add, edit, or remove entries in the selected calendar.

    Displays the landing page where users can log in, sign up, or exit.

  • Method Details

    • displayCalendar

      public void displayCalendar()
      Displays the monthly calendar grid for the currently selected calendar and date, including markers (*) on days with entries.

    • displayEntriesOfDay

      public void displayEntriesOfDay(int dayNumber)
      Displays all entries that occur on a specific day of the currently selected calendar.
      Parameters:
      dayNumber - the numeric day of the month to display entries for (1â€“31).

    • displayLandingPage

      public String displayLandingPage()
      Displays the landing page where users can log in, sign up, or exit.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the next page to navigate to.

    • displayLoginPage

      public String displayLoginPage()
      Displays the login page for user authentication.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the next page to navigate to.

    • displaySignUpPage

      public String displaySignUpPage()
      Displays the sign-up page to create a new account.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the next page to navigate to.

    • displayMenuPage

      public String displayMenuPage()
      Displays the main menu after login, allowing users to manage calendars and perform account actions. Available actions include selecting or adding calendars, viewing today's entries, and account deletion.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the next page to navigate to.

    • displayEntryOptions

      public String displayEntryOptions()
      Displays and handles options to view, add, edit, or remove entries in the selected calendar. Includes input validation for dates and times.
      Returns:
      a navigation keyword indicating the next page.

    • displayMonthSelection

      public String displayMonthSelection()
      Displays a month selection menu allowing the user to choose which month's calendar to view or edit. When a valid month is selected, the method redirects to the entry options interface for that month.
      Returns:
      a navigation keyword indicating the next page.
